description: Configuration information for the xAPI DataAnalyzer tool.

Filter_Emails.description: A list of emails to ignore (i.e. non-student emails).

Time_Delta.description: A number of minutes that defines a max duration in between interactions that a student is considered still engaged with the reading

Days.description: A list of day objects containing relevant info such as the title and H5P elements present

Unit.description: The unit this day is a part of

Elements.description: A list of the H5P elementIDs found in the chapter
